thread.title: Lonnie D
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Lonnie D

author: Lonnie D
title: Lonnie D
text:
I purchased my first White Mountain puzzle in a national chain book store.
Everyone loved it! I wanted to get more, so began looking for White Mountain puzzles on an internet retailer site.
I then realized White Mountain has its own site. I would recommend that anyone interested in puzzles check this site first. I was amazed by the selection. Easy to navigate web site too. Will definitely order again.
